text: Ihudi o khristanara kakhana'i apanara prati santusta habe na, ye paryanta na apani tadera dharmera anusarana karena. Bale dina, ye patha allaha pradarsana karena, ta'i hala sarala patha. Yadi apani tadera akankhasamuhera anusarana karena, ai jnana labhera para, ya apanara kache paumcheche, tabe ke'u allahara kabala theke apanara ud'dharakari o sahayyakari ne'i.
